reviews.review_msg: Bryan is a laid back teacher, who is absolutely HILARIOUS. His lectures were easy to follow & stay focused during. Would take another class with him. I thought the tests were a bit challenging in that the material has very similar concepts that can be tricky to distinguish during multiple choice. Overall loved the course and professor; very  fair!

Loved the class. The course material was interesting, however, there is quite a bit of it. Try not take this course during the intersession, it is very demanding. Bryan was an excellent prof and I would absolutely take another class with him.
